name: miniRTS
description:
My first godot game that i have made.

You are the castle with the white flag on the right side and the enemy is on the left side. Your objective is to destroy enemys castle and defend yours.

You can buy houses that you can place near your castle, which increase your income.

You can upgrade your units so they become stronger

Your units attack automatically

controls are mostly with mouse

left click and drag - select your units

right click - order units to move to the location

middle click - move camera

scroll - zoom

WASD - move camera

ESC - pause game
